text: God uabɨ navir amɨrizimɨn mɨngarim, a ia damightɨma ia uari isɨ bar a danɨng, egh an damazimɨn bar zuegham. Eghtɨ a ian duaba ko, mɨkarziba ko, ikɨrɨmɨriba bar moghɨra deraghvɨra dar gantɨ, da deraghvɨra ikɨva en Ekiam Krais Iesus izamin dughiamɨn ia arazir kuratam Godɨn damazimɨn bar puvatɨgham.
